segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the open window overlooking a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are pulled back, letting in plenty of daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is at the sink area, polishing a dish absentmindedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and spilling everywhere, but she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger, and it's right under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a nasty slip; I'm really worried about her safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that's tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls from that height, it might hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hand out, encouraging him in the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, and cookies are spilling out almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything looks so peaceful compared to this indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
